name: Grobblings
description:
Loot treasure in caves in a puzzle strategy game. Since you wanted to raise profit with cheap labour, you ended up with recruiting two conflicting clans. They need to keep isolated! 

> Move your Target with Arrows/WASD
> Place /pickup a rock with SPACE
> Toggle between build and looting phase with ENTER

Keep the different clans of goblins isolated to loot treasures in caves.

A game by Bengan & Drum
